column1: Congratulations @CSexton25 on being selected by your colleagues to be the next speaker. I know you will be a great leader for Tennessee!
Congratulations @VandyBoys! Tennessee is so proud of you! https://t.co/va8Kdqnvvz

Good to have @ToddYoungIN join @BillLeeTN @VoteMarsha and I at tonight’s @TNGOP Statesmen’s Dinner and talk about #WhyItMatters that we continue our majority in the U.S. Senate. https://t.co/bd3rzHdQN4
Congratulations @wmspowers on your special election victory. I know you will serve Tennesseans well in the state Senate!
Congratulations @PaulRoseTN on your victory — I know you’ll represent West Tennesseans well in the General Assembly. https://t.co/VUky2aL4yZ
Congratulations @wmspowers on your victory in Senate District 22! I know you will be a good conservative voice for Tennesseans in the General Assembly.
TUNE IN to @foxnews at 1 PM ET — I’ll be talking with @HarrisFaulkner about border security and funding the government.
Tune in to @997wtn at 7:45 AM CT for my conversation with @BrianWilson997. Listen live here: https://t.co/YxS3cCKUO7
Congratulations to my former Memphis intern @AlexSchramTN on being elected @TeamTNCR chairman this weekend!

I’m looking forward to having Ambassador A.B. Culvahouse our new ambassador to Australia as my special guest to President Trump’s #SOTU tonight. He’s from Tennessee one of the most distinguished lawyers in America and one of the finest public servants I know.
Looking forward to joining @BrianWilson997 on Nashville’s @997wtn around 7:35 AM CT this morning. Tune-in: https://t.co/YxS3cCKUO7
For over 60 years Charlie Daniel has been the first thing I’ve read in the paper. https://t.co/GpH4F29jUT

TUNE IN at about 10:00 AM ET for my conversation with @MariaBartiromo on @FoxNews’ @SundayFutures to discuss the deal to reopen the federal government and the path forward to consider the presidents reasonable request for border security.
